Initial commit: AI Image Upscaler (Upsizer)

Features implemented:
- AI-powered image upscaling (2x-8x) using Real-ESRGAN & GFPGAN
- Quality enhancement mode (1x - improve quality without resizing)
- 7 preset modes: Quality Boost, Portrait, Landscape, Art, Restoration, Maximum, Custom
- Always-visible preset cards with hover effects and visual feedback
- Dynamic pricing page with Free, Subscription, One-time, and Enterprise plans
- Monthly/Yearly billing toggle with 70% discount for annual plans
- Fully responsive Next.js 14 app with TypeScript
- Firebase authentication integration
- Credit system for usage tracking
- SEO optimized metadata
- Enterprise solutions section with bulk processing and API integration

- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Firebase & NextAuth
